means: 伐楼拿（婆罗门教神名，被称为“宇宙大王”和“秩序的维护者”）

sentence.Network_en: There are countless gems in the coffers of Varuna.
sentence.Network_cn: 伐楼拿的保险箱内有数之不尽的珍宝,但他还没有注意到它们. ”

sentence.Network_en: In Hinduism he is praised as the binomial Mitra - Varuna.
sentence.Network_cn: 在印度教,他被认为是二分性的密特拉—伐楼拿而赞扬.

means.word_mean: 1. in Vedism, god of the night sky who with his thousand eyes watches over human conduct and judges good and evil and punishes evildoers; often considered king of the Hindu gods and frequently paired with Mitra as an upholder of the world

auth_sentence.content: Scientists say that Varuna goes some way to vindicate the views held by the late US astronomer Clyde Tombaugh.
auth_sentence.res_content: Scientists say that Varuna goes some way to vindicate the views held by the late US astronomer Clyde Tombaugh.
